documentType.label: other
reasons: Document is a product brochure / plans-at-a-glance for MetLife LTC LifeStage Advantage, not an invoice, CMR or UB04 form
Contains marketing headings, plan descriptions, rider summaries and benefit tables

fields.name: plan_type
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: monthly_benefit_label
fields.value: Monthly Benefit Amount (MBA) and Total Benefit Amount (TBA)

fields.name: mba_tba_custom_values
fields.value: MBA examples similar; TBA options include up to $1MM for Custom (note: $1MM not available with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: optional_riders_header
fields.value: OPTIONAL RIDERS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE

fields.name: shared_care_rider
fields.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; When insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; Rider available at any time, subject to underwriting; Both spouse/partners must have identical policies

fields.name: nonforfeiture_rider
fields.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; Rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to the greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Available at initial application only

fields.name: cash_benefit_rider
fields.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; Available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available with Cash Benefit Rider; Benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_header
fields.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

tables.caption: Plan comparison (Simple vs Custom) top summary table

rows.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)
